languages.text: {n}Неловко отстраняясь от вас, Кассия осторожно прикрывает ладонью третье око, словно боясь вновь излить на вас разбушевавшиеся силы своей души.{/n} "Вы рисковали жизнью, чтобы спасти меня. Для Вольного Торговца, правителя великой династии, это... просто безумие. Вы безответственны!" {n}Кассия рассерженно хмурит брови, но взгляд ее полнится болью и отчаянием.{/n} "Ваш протекторат, миллиарды подданных, могли лишиться своего правителя в один миг. А вы... О чем вы вообще думали?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Неловко отстраняясь от вас, Кассия осторожно прикрывая ладонью третье око, словно боясь вновь излить на вас разбушевавшиеся силы своей души.{/n} "Вы рисковали жизнью, чтобы спасти меня. Для Вольного Торговца, правителя великой династии, это... просто безумие. Вы безответственны!" {n}Кассия рассержено хмурит брови, но взгляд ее полнится болью и отчаянием.{/n} "Ваш протекторат, миллиарды подданных, могли лишиться своего правителя в один миг. А вы... О чем вы вообще думали?"

languages.text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

Для Вольного Торговца, правителя великой династии, это... просто безумие. Вы безответственны!" {n}Кассия рассерженно хмурит брови, но взгляд ее полнится болью и отчаянием.{/n} "Ваш протекторат, миллиарды подданных, могли лишиться своего правителя в один миг. А вы... О чем вы вообще думали?"

For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter madness. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, the billions of your subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in an eyeblink. Yet you... What were you even thinking?"

Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

languages.text: {n}カシアはぎこちなく一歩下がり、第三の目をそっと覆った。まるで、もう一度あなたに魂の激情を解き放つのではないかと恐れているかのようだ。{/n}「あなたは私のために命を懸けてくれました。偉大な王朝の支配者である自由開拓者にとって、それは狂気の沙汰としか言いようがありません。無責任な行動です！」{n}カシアは憤慨して眉をひそめたが、その目は苦痛と絶望に満ちていた。{/n}「あなたの保護国家、何十億もの臣民、彼らは一瞬のうちに主権者を失ったかもしれないのですよ。それなのに、あなたは…何を考えていたのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはぎこちなく一歩下がり、第三の目をそっと覆った。まるで、もう一度あなたに魂の激情を解き放つのではないかと恐れているかのようだ。{/n}「あなたは私のために命を懸けてくれました。偉大な王朝の支配者である自由開拓者にとって、それは狂気の沙汰としか言いようがありません。無責任な行動です！」{n}カシアは憤慨して眉をひそめたが、その目は苦痛と絶望に満ちていた。{/n}「あなたの保護国家、何十億もの臣民、彼らは一瞬のうちに主権者を失ったかもしれないのですよ。それなのに、あなたは…何を考えていたのですか？」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅笨拙地退了一步，小心翼翼地遮住了她的第三只眼，好像很害怕会再次将狂暴的灵魂之力倾泻在你身上。{/n}“你是行商浪人，是伟大王朝的统治者，可你却冒着生命危险救了我。这……这简直是疯了，是非常不负责任的做法！”{n}卡西娅恼怒地皱着眉头，但目光中却充满了痛苦和绝望。{/n}“想想你的王朝，想想你的数十亿臣民。他们可能会在转眼之间失去他们的统治者，可你却……你刚刚究竟是怎么想的？”
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅笨拙地退了一步，小心翼翼地遮住了她的第三只眼，好像很害怕会再次将狂暴的心灵力量倾泻在你身上。{/n}“你是行商浪人，是伟大王朝的统治者，可你却冒着生命危险救了我。这……这简直是疯了，是非常不负责任的做法！”{n}卡西娅恼怒地皱着眉头，但目光中却充满了痛苦和绝望。{/n}“想想你的王朝，想想你的数十亿臣民。他们可能会在转眼之间失去他们的统治者，可你却……你刚刚究竟是怎么想的？”

languages.text: {n}Con un brusco paso atrás, Cassia se tapa cautelosamente el tercer ojo, como si temiera desatar de nuevo sobre ti los poderes tempestuosos de su alma.{/n} «Has puesto en riesgo tu vida para salvarme. Para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, gobernante de una gran dinastía, ha sido... una completa locura. ¡Una irresponsabilidad!». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, indignada, pero sus ojos están llenos de dolor y desesperación.{/n} «Tu protectorado y tus miles de millones de súbditos podrían haber perdido a su soberan{mf|o|a} en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Y aun así... ¿En qué estabas pensando?».
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un brusco paso atrás, Cassia se tapa cautelosamente el tercer ojo, como si temiera desatar de nuevo sobre ti los poderes tempestuosos de su alma.{/n} «Has puesto en riesgo tu vida para salvarme. Para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, gobernante de una gran dinastía, ha sido... una completa locura. ¡Una irresponsabilidad!». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, indignada, pero sus ojos están llenos de dolor y desesperación.{/n} «Tu protectorado y tus miles de millones de súbditos podrían haber perdido a su soberan{mf|o|a} en un abrir y cerrar de ojos. Y aun así... ¿En qué estabas pensando?».

languages.text: {n}Cassia tritt verschämt einen Schritt zurück und bedeckt vorsichtig ihr drittes Auge, als habe sie Angst, dass sie erneut die stürmische Kraft ihrer Seele gegen dich entfesseln könnte.{/n} "Ihr habt Euer Leben riskiert, um mich zu retten. Für {mf|einen Freihändler, den Herrscher|eine Freihändlerin, die Herrscherin} einer großen Dynastie, war das ... völliger Wahnsinn. Es war unverantwortlich!" {n}Cassia legt entrüstet die Stirn in Falten, doch ihre Augen sind voller Schmerz und Verzweiflung.{/n} "Euer Protektorat, die Milliarden Eurer Untertanen, sie hätten in einem einzigen Augenblick ihren Souverän verlieren können. Und doch habt Ihr ... Was habt Ihr Euch dabei gedacht?"
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia tritt verschämt einen Schritt zurück und bedeckt vorsichtig ihr drittes Auge, als habe sie Angst, dass sie erneut die stürmische Kraft ihres Herzens gegen dich entfesseln könnte.{/n} "Ihr habt Euer Leben riskiert, um mich zu retten. Für {mf|einen Freihändler, den Herrscher|eine Freihändlerin, die Herrscherin} einer großen Dynastie, war das ... völliger Wahnsinn. Es war unverantwortlich!" {n}Cassia legt entrüstet die Stirn in Falten, doch ihre Augen sind voller Schmerz und Verzweiflung.{/n} "Euer Protektorat, die Milliarden Eurer Untertanen, sie hätten in einem einzigen Augenblick ihren Souverän verlieren können. Und doch habt Ihr ... Was habt Ihr Euch dabei gedacht?"

languages.text: {n}Cassia fait un pas malhabile en arrière et couvre son troisième œil d'une main, sans doute par peur de déchaîner sur vous une nouvelle fois les pouvoirs tempétueux de son âme.{/n} « Vous avez risqué votre vie pour me sauver. Pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, qui plus est {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante} d'une dynastie telle que la vôtre... ce n'était que pure folie. Je ne vous aurais jamais {mf|cru|crue} si irresponsable ! » {n}Indignée, Cassia fronce les sourcils, mais vous pouvez lire la souffrance et le désespoir dans son regard.{/n} « Votre protectorat, vos innombrables sujets... Ils auraient pu perdre leur {mf|souverain|souveraine} en un claquement de doigts. Et pourtant... À quoi pensiez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia fait un pas malhabile en arrière et couvre son troisième œil d'une main, sans doute par peur de déchaîner sur vous une nouvelle fois les pouvoirs tempétueux de son cœur.{/n} « Vous avez risqué votre vie pour me sauver. Pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, qui plus est {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante} d'une dynastie telle que la vôtre... ce n'était que pure folie. Je ne vous aurais jamais {mf|cru|crue} si irresponsable ! » {n}Indignée, Cassia fronce les sourcils, mais vous pouvez lire la souffrance et le désespoir dans son regard.{/n} « Votre protectorat, vos innombrables sujets... Ils auraient pu perdre leur {mf|souverain|souveraine} en un claquement de doigts. Et pourtant... À quoi pensiez-vous ? »

languages.text: {n}Mahcup bir hâlde geri çekilen Cassia, eliyle dikkatlice üçüncü gözünü kapatıyor. Ruhunun şiddetli gücünü yeniden üzerine salmaktan korkuyor olmalı.{/n} "Beni kurtarmak için canını tehlikeye attın. Ulu bir hanedanlığın hükümdarı olan bir Hür Tacir için büyük ahmaklık ettin. Sorumsuzsun!" {n}Cassia, kızgınlıkla kaşlarını çatıyor. Gözleri ise acı ve kederle dolu.{/n} "Bir anda tüm protektoranla milyarlarca kulunu hükümdarsız bırakabilirdin. Sense kalkmış... Aklından ne geçiyordu acaba?"
languages.original_text: {n}Taking an awkward step back, Cassia gingerly covers her third eye, as if afraid that she might unleash her soul's tempestuous powers upon you once more.{/n} "You risked your life to save me. For a Rogue Trader, the ruler of a great dynasty, it was... utter lunacy. It was irresponsible!" {n}Cassia's brow furrows indignantly, but her eyes are full of pain and despair.{/n} "Your protectorate, your billions of subjects, they could have lost their sovereign in the blink of an eye. Yet, you... What were you even thinking?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mahcup bir hâlde geri çekilen Cassia, yeniden ruhunun şiddetli gücünü yeniden üzerine salmaktan korkuyormuşçasına eliyle dikkatlice üçüncü gözünü kapatıyor.{/n} "Beni kurtarmak için kendi canını tehlikeye attın. Bir Hür Tacir olarak, ulu bir hanedanlığın hükümdarısın. Çok büyük bir ahmaklık ettin. Sorumsuzun tekisin!" {n}Cassia kızgınlıkla kaşlarını çatıyor. Gözleri ise acı ve kederle dolu.{/n} "Bir anda tüm protektoranla milyarlarca kulunu hükümdarsız bırakabilirdin. Sense kalkmış... Aklından ne geçiyordu acaba?"
